sourcesContent:
<template >

<Navbar v-if="showNavbar" :user="user" />

<router-view
@login-success="handleLoginSuccess"
@exit-succes="hanldeExit"></router-view>
</template>
<script>
import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';






export default{
  components:{
    Navbar
  },
  data(){
    return{
      showNavbar:false,
    }
  },
    beforeUnmount() {
        // localStorage'daki değerleri güncelle
      localStorage.setItem("ActiveUserId",-1);
      localStorage.setItem("ActiveUserType","");
      localStorage.setItem("showNavbar",false);

    }, methods: {
    handleLoginSuccess(user) {
      this.user = user;
      this.showNavbar = true;
      this.$router.push('/home');
    },
    hanldeExit(){
      localStorage.setItem("ActiveUserId",-1);
      localStorage.setItem("ActiveUserType","");
      this.showNavbar=false;
    },
  }
    
    

}
    
    
</script>
